alert.note: Alert for Lower Garfield and Asotin Counties; Washington Palouse (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 03 at 3:41PM PST until January 03 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. Winds gusting up to 35 mph possible, higher winds on exposed ridgetops. * WHERE...Potlatch, Rosalia, Clarkston, Plummer, Pomeroy, Colfax, Nezperce, Tekoa, Moscow, Craigmont, Genesee, Soldiers Meadow Road, Alpowa Summit, Uniontown, Kamiah, La Crosse, Pullman, Winchester, and Oakesdale. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Winter driving conditions are expected. Drifting snow on roadways is likely.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lower Garfield and Asotin Counties; Washington Palouse
